02_01.question: Which of the following blocks of code would ensure users are properly authorized for the URL: /admin/

02_02.question: Which of the following blocks of code would ensure users are properly authenticated for the URL: /members/

02_03.question: Authentication methods rely on which of the following factors? (select all that apply)

02_04.question: Which of the following are true about using a CSS framework like Bootstrap? (select all that apply)

A.choice: CSS frameworks reduce the amount of CSS you have to write yourself.

B.choice: CSS frameworks increase website download speeds due to fewer and smaller file sizes.

C.choice: CSS frameworks encourage a consistent design and layout across different web pages.

02_05.question: Which of the following are examples of Authentication? (select all that apply)

A.choice: A one-time use login link sent via email.

B.choice: Using HTTPS instead of HTTP protocol.

F.choice: A 6-digit code sent via text message to a phone.

02_06.question: Which of the following are examples of Authorization? (select all that apply)

B.choice: Using HTTPS instead of HTTP protocol.

02_07.question: Which of the following are correct regarding the use of EJS as an HTML templating language? (select all that apply)

A.choice: EJS only works with modern browsers.

B.choice: EJS helps create a modular code structure.

C.choice: EJS encourages reuse of HTML code blocks through includes.

D.choice: EJS can help improve code readability.

E.choice: EJS improves search engine optimization (SEO) rankings due to faster loading times.

F.choice: EJS improves the speed of database queries through cacheing and indexing.
